alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 17 at 7:28PM PDT until October 18 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Ventura County Beaches. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways affected will include portions of Highway 1 along the Santa Barbara South Coast, Harbor Boulevard along the Ventura Coast, and other roads near the coast.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Ventura County Beaches
